p: Overall, the distributions of negatively selected sites were strongly conserved between the A1 Afr genes and those of the A1 Eur, CRFs 01_AE, 02_AG, and 22_01A1 datasets ( Fig.Â 3 and Supplementary Fig. S2) in gag and pol. This broad conservation of negative selection patterns is consistent with sub-subtype A1 gag, and pol sequences being pre-adapted to functioning in host and viral genomic environments different to those within which they evolved.
